column1: Visitation for Josephine will be held on Monday
column4: at the Northern Peace Funeral Home in Walker and one hour prior to the service at the church.  Funeral services will be held at 11:00 a.m.
column7: at the Calvary Evangelical Free Church in Walker with Rev. John Dainsberg officiating.  Active pallbearers helping to lay Josephine to rest will be Matthew Armstrong
column12: and Terry Ryan.  Honorary pallbearers will be Nathaniel Armstrong
column19: and Uhuru Hoosman.  Interment will be held in the Evergreen Cemetery at Walker following the service.  Refreshments for family and friends will be served at the Calvary Evangelical Free Church following the graveside service.
